resources.string: Screen refresh rate
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your phone.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.
Touch the sensor on the front of your phone.
Touch the sensor on the back of your phone.
Touch the sensor on the side of your phone.
Warning: This option may not work properly or lead to data loss and is therefore not recommended!
Icon manager
Control visibility of status bar icons
Tap to sleep
Double-tap on the status bar or lockscreen to turn off the display
Swipe to screenshot
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Playback control
When the screen is off, long-pressing volume keys will skip music tracks
Kill background processes
Stop all non-essential background processes when the device is idle
Cycle through modes
On (cycle through modes)
Force LTE CA
Force LTE carrier aggregation to work
